library(here)

source_semester_script <- function(script) {
  script_file <- file.path(script.dir, script)
  message("Running script", script_file)
  source(script_file, chdir = T)
}

eval_in_sem_script_dir <- function(expr, loc = script.dir) {
  this.dir <- getwd()
  setwd(loc)
  retval <- eval(expr)
  setwd(this.dir)
  invisible(retval)
}
